content.description: From the Guidebook: "Start with feet on the lower block. Climb up and right through compression." Start as best I could figure out was right hand sloper and left and crimp rail (marked by X's). Then move up and right on right hand slopers and left hand crimps to a nice jug for an extremely awkward top out bumping your head on the huge overhanging boulder.
content.protection: 1-2 pads. Spotter would be good for the top.
content.location: Right underneath the huge overhanging boulder that has Octurnal on the other side. Boulder #5 if you are looking at the guidebook map.

content.description:
Start from a sharp sidepull and a  knee high jug, use chossy feet to the left to pull to up better holds. a big hold recently ripped off making this probably around v3 or so. After it ripped I didnt bother trying it so feel free to give feedback.

 Stand goes around v1
content.location: From the road follow the steep trail about halfway to the methlab boulder.

content.description:
Despite a committing move near the top at around 15' this is a decent warm-up.  Descend off the left of the boulder. 

  Someone put a couple of bolts at the top of this so I suppose it could be toproped.
content.location: On the back side of the second enormous boulder from the parking lot.

content.description: Start squatting on positive holds, find feet and go!
content.location: Take the steep trail from the road up about halfway to the methlab boulder and look left. next to "ie (sit)"

content.description: Stand Start, Make a big move to a good hold then a tricky reach to the top.
content.location: From the road, take the Main Trail (toilet bowl boulder trail), turn left at the "Boys in the Woods" boulder. If you are at the methlab boulder you've gone too far!

content.description: This area is a catch all for routes which do not have known locations. If you know where any of these are submit a page request to move the route to the proper area.
